instruction: Reorganize the following pieces of information into a well-structured outline.
input:
• Causes of Air Pollution 
• Health Risks associated with Air Pollution 
• Prevention Strategies
output:
I. Causes of Air Pollution 
A. Natural Causes 
B. Human-made causes 
II. Health Risks associated with Air Pollution 
A. Respiratory Diseases 
B. Cardiovascular Diseases 
C. Lung Cancer 
III. Prevention Strategies 
A. Reduce the Consumption of Fossil Fuels 
B. Adopt Sustainable Practices 
C. Implement Innovative Solutions
